alert.note: Alert for Collin; Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 4:59AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Denton and northwestern Collin Counties through 530 AM CST... At 458 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lewisville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plano, McKinney, Carrollton, Frisco, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Grapevine, Coppell, The Colony, Corinth, Highland Village, Lake Dallas, Lake Lewisville, Little Elm, Prosper, Celina, Hickory Creek, Shady Shores, Aubrey and Krugerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
